data.title: Add Music to Gato
data.text: I would like to be able to play a song when people visit my page.

data.title: Create TRACS accounts for pets
data.text: I would to list my dog as my co-instructor.

data.title: Another Gato Idea
data.text: I'm not feeling very creative right now.  Any new feature would be great.

data.title: Yet Another Gato Idea
data.text: Let's get rid of the template and let everyone design their own sites.
